Articles.Content:
Ok everyone, we\'ve got artists, meshers, texturers, coders, role-players.

Do we have any writers?

Ok, without further ado; here is the first Kerbal Write-Off.

Your job is to write a story, of any subject related to space. You must follow the rules. The guidelines are optional, but recommended. The competition starts now and ends on March the 31st, 2012.

Rules:


  • [li]Contains at least 1500 words.[/li]
    [li]Contains something space related.[/li]
    [li]Nothing over what would be considered a \'Teen\' rating.[/li]

Guidelines


  • [li]Please try to write the story in clear, legible English.[/li]
    [li]Please try to use correct grammar and paragraphing, ensuring a clear and concise story structure[/li]

Please reply here if you wish to take on the competition. Also, please do not reveal the story to anyone as you are writing, we don\'t want anyone to jump the gun.

When you are done writing the story, please Private Message it to me and it will be voted by the forum, then the best ones will be judged by a panel of five people, who will select the winner.

The winner...will win, and have their great fic shown as the best work of writing that Kerbal Space Program has to offer.

I look forward to seeing some submissions!
Alright, I\'m going to kick some ass here. Particularly Mojoey\'s, hehehe.

Alright, I\'m going to kick some ass here. Particularly Mojoey\'s, hehehe.

bitch i\'ll kick your ass and then my writing will beat the teeth out of you with a lead-lined baceball bat...IM IN

LETS DO THIS
Have we got any more takers? Tt\'s a bit small if we\'ve only got three writers. =P

I might.

You guys are gonna love it.
Darn, please make a new contest for April!
ill do an april one, as i dont have the time, but i will upload one after my holiday, should last a week
I can\'t get one written in a day. May start now for April.
I could try to write one quickly, but don\'t expect anything stellar.
